author: aaron
msg: I hate calling votes like this, but I think we need a consensus.

author: trawick
msg: Reduce the number of apr_sendfile calls on AIX and OS/390 by
remembering when the kernel tells us the next one will block.

author: gregames
msg: apr_sendfile: implement APR_INCOMPLETE_WRITE semantics for FreeBSD.  This
cuts the number of sendfile syscalls in half for big files.
Also, bail out early in the normal case to reduce i-cache pollution.

author: trawick
msg: for the gethostbyname() path in apr_sockaddr_info_get(), always handle
numeric address strings...  this solved a weird binary compatibility

author: jim
msg: handle some bogus error messages and output, esp. when using gcc3,
when preprocessing the apr_atomic_sparc.s file when using GNUas.
Should allow a clean and valid compile of the atomic code now.
